name: Titan Wings
description:
Build your spaceship, play against computer or against friends in realtime multiplayer, rank up the leaderboard, get achievements and complete quests

Titan Wings is a spaceinvaders like game where you can either play against the AI, against a specific friend of yours or against a random player. You can customize your spaceship with different bases, wings, weapons or engines. All customizations are aesthetic only, they wont change your hitboxes, speed, weapon power or lifes ingame.

In singleplayer mode you can gain points to rank up on the leaderboard. There is a social/global points leaderboard which shows the amount of points achieved in a single game and a social/global time leaderboard which shows you the maximum time played in a single game.

In multiplayer mode you play over network against your friends or a random opponent. Because there is a network delay between players visual differences may occur. They don't affect gameplay as all hits/shots/points are calculated locally.

In all game modes you can get achievements and complete missions.

Note: some features are only available to play services users

FEATURES

  • customizable spaceships
  • singleplayer mode with leaderboards
  • realtime multiplayer mode against friends
  • realtime multiplayer mode against random opponents
  • challenging gameplay
  • achievements
  • daily/weekly quests with rewards*

CONTROLS

You steer your spaceship with the rotation of your phone. Tilt your phone to the left to steer left and right to steer right.

To shoot you just tap anywhere on the screen.

PERMISSIONS

  • WAKE_LOCK: keep the screen on
  • VIBRATE: vibrate on hit / notifications
  • INTERNET: play games services / ad downloads
  • ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: play games services / ad downloads

Note: This is only Beta. Please send bug reports to titanwings@freakxzone.de

*(ingame currency store not available yet)
